manipulation.sound.MP3

Class MP3Codec

  • java.lang.Object
    • manipulation.sound.MP3.MP3Codec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Codec

    public class MP3Codec
extends java.lang.Object
implements Codec

    Class used to handle MP3 files, allowing embedding and recovery of hidden messages.

        public void decodeStream(byte[] audioBytes)

        Reads a file from a byte array.

        Reads a given MP3 byte array

        Specified by:
        decodeStream in interface Codec
        Parameters:
        audioBytes - the array containing the file

      • encode_msg

        public void encode_msg(byte[] message,
                       java.lang.String passwordKey,
                       int degradation)
                throws MessageTooLargeException

        Embeds a given hidden message into the file structure.

        Provides embedding of a message in the current MP3 structure.

        Specified by:
        encode_msg in interface Codec
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be embedded
        passwordKey - a key which can be used in the embedding
        degradation - a value to change the degradation level of the embedding
        Throws:
        MessageTooLargeException

      • decode_msg

        public byte[] decode_msg(java.lang.String passwordKey)
                  throws MessageTooLargeException,
                         java.lang.Exception

        Recovers a message from the file structure.

        Must be able to extract the same message embedding in encode_msg.

        Provides recovery of a message from the current MP3 structure.

        Specified by:
        decode_msg in interface Codec
        Parameters:
        passwordKey - a key which can be used in the recovery
        Returns:
        byte array of the hidden message
        Throws:
        MessageTooLargeException
        java.lang.Exception

      • getCapacity

        public int getCapacity()

        Gets the embedding capacity of the MP3 file in bytes.

        Returns:
        the capacity, in bytes, of the MP3 file

      • genStego

        public byte[] genStego()

        Produces a byte array containing the file (with any modifications made).

        The returned file must be of the same format of the one the Codec reads, and must include any embedded hidden messages.

        Converts the MP3 into a byte array format.

        Specified by:
        genStego in interface Codec
        Returns:
        byte array containing the file

      • getSamplePerFrame

        public static int getSamplePerFrame(byte mpegVersion,
                                    byte layerVersion)

        Gets the amount of samples for a given MPEG version and layer type.

        Parameters:
        mpegVersion - the MPEG version of the frame
        layerVersion - the Layer type of the frame
        Returns:
        the sample rate of the frame
